shows.title: Peter Bazely : Interpreted
shows.desc:
Half traditional entertainer, half mystical, deadpan soothsayer, Bazely the morose enigma mixes stand-up, performance art and theatre; all combined with interactions and interpretation from the Canopy’s very own Katie Love (BSL level 3).

Peter Bazely is a veteran of comedy clubs and festivals up and down the country, including a 2018 sell-out run at Edinburgh.
